name: Firefox Dark Compact
description: This is for the new compact theme that comes with Firefox. So before you install this, go to about:addons (preferences/options) --> appearance --> compact dark. If you're on Nightly 57, you might also like my userChrome.css which is a dark and minimal theme a bit different than this one: https://pastebin.com/AUSzqWXB
additional_info:
Tested w/ Firefox 54 on Linux Mint 17 and Windows 7.

To hide the titlebar on Linux, you can also install Hide Caption Titlebar Plus https://addons.mozilla.org/en-US/firefox/addon/hide-caption-titlebar-plus-sma/

discussions.name: Thanks for making this style. This is what I'm looking for: being a truly dark compact Firefox.
